name: Technical Support
description: Issues related to technical problems, bugs, system errors, or troubleshooting assistance

name: Billing and Payments
description: Questions about invoices, payment methods, refunds, pricing, or subscription management

name: Feature Requests
description: Requests for new features, enhancements to existing functionality, or product improvements

name: Account Management
description: Issues related to account settings, authentication, user profiles, or access control

name: General Inquiry
description: General questions about the product, service, or company information
